detail_desc: Top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sturdy hat in felted wool with a band. Width of brim 7 cm.
Pyjamas in soft velour. Long-sleeved top with an appliqué on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a faux fur-lined hood with a detachable, foldover faux fur trim. Zip with a wind flap and concealed press-studs down the front, a drawstring at the waist, side pockets with press-studs and a zipped sleeve pocket. Inner ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent with a drawstring. Quilted lining.

Short, off-the-shoulder dress in a crinkled viscose weave with elastication at the top and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Crocheted lace panels at the front and an elasticated seam at the waist. Lined skirt.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a foldover edge at the top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
V-neck dress in an airy weave with short, double-flounced sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and ties at the sides. Lined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with buttons on one shoulder, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined, drawstring, wrapover hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket jeans in soft, washed stretch denim with embroidered appliqués on the front, an adjustable elasticated waist and fly with a press-stud.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 2.9 cm.
Ankle-length trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist and extended waistband with a metal decoration and press-stud. Zip fly, fake back pockets and tapered legs.
Jumper in a fine, sturdy knit with buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Linen shirt with a collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
V-neck T-shirts in soft jersey.

Waist bag in woven fabric with a large zipped compartment with a carabiner hook and woven handle on the front. Zipped compartment at the back, an inner compartment and an adjustable waist belt with a plastic snap lock. Lined. Size 5x18x32 cm.

Shirt in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Chino shorts in a washed cotton weave with a zip fly, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets. Regular fit.
T-shirt in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with an embroidered appliqué on the chest and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Blouse in an airy weave with a stand-up collar and gathers at the top to create soft draping front and back. Opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves, cuffs with covered buttons, and a gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in heavy sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Blouse in woven fabric with a round neck and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with smocking and a flounce at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Fully lined bikini with a flounced top and matching bottoms with lace and a print motif. The top has narrow, adjustable shoulder straps with a small metal decoration attached to one strap.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot detail.
Fitted, calf-length dress in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend containing some wool. Ribbed stand-up collar, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a flared skirt.
Blouse in cotton seersucker with a round neckline that has an opening with a concealed button at the back. Long, trumpet sleeves and a tie detail at the hem.
Round shoulder bag in braided paper straw with two handles and a zip at the top, a narrow, imitation leather shoulder strap and an inner compartment. Lined. Depth 6.5 cm. Diameter 24.5 cm.
Sleeveless top in soft jersey with a flounce at the top.
Slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in stretch, supersoft denim. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs.

Backpack in woven fabric with a handle at the top and a roll-top opening with an adjustable tab and plastic fastener. Adjustable, padded shoulder straps with D-rings, a padded back plate and side pockets, one in mesh. Lined. Size 14x27x46 cm.
Shortie briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Grosgrain-covered metal Alice band decorated with ears covered with fabric flowers.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a wide flounce at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, one with a small decoration.
Patterned blouse in airy chiffon with frills at the shoulders, arms and cuffs. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Partly lined in jersey.

Windbreaker in a crisp weave made from a nylon blend with a stand-up collar and drawstring. Hood that can be folded, concealed and zipped inside the collar, a zip down the front and mesh-lined side pockets. Long sleeves with a tab and adjustable fastening at the cuffs, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Mesh lining.
Fully lined sports bralette in fast-drying functional fabric. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Light support.
Short lace dress with a V-neck, zip at the back, long sleeves, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Partly lined.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Short shorts in a sturdy cotton weave with a zip fly and button and patch pockets front and back.

Calf-length dress in a soft viscose weave with a V-neck and wrapover front with ties at one side. Long, slightly wider sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a softly draping, gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Trousers in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button and side, back and leg pockets with a flap and concealed press-studs. Tapered legs with seams at the knees.

Jacket in a cotton weave with a matt coating, collar and decorative gathers around the neckline. Press-studs down the front, long raglan sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs, side pockets and a drawstring at the waist. Unlined.
High-waisted trousers in stretch twill with an embroidered motif at the top, a concealed zip at one side and slim legs.
Jumper in a soft, textured cashmere knit with a V-neck and dropped shoulders.
Calf-length, V-neck dress in woven fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, buttons down the front, smocking at the back and a seam at the waist with a flared skirt. Lined.
Fully lined swimsuit with a print motif on the front and narrow shoulder straps.

Set with a long-sleeved jumper and leggings in fine-knit wool. Jumper with roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, and roll edges at the hems.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with long ties.
Baby Exclusive. Jumper in soft, rib-knit merino wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Mittens in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs. Fleece lining.
Top in soft, slub cotton jersey with short sleeves in a broderie anglaise weave. Narrow ribbing around the neckline and a tie detail at the front of the hem.
Fitted short-sleeved top in slub jersey made from organic cotton with a round neck and rounded hem.
Round-necked jumper in a soft knit with a motif, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Wide, round-necked blouse in a cotton weave with embroidery, partially concealed buttons down the front and long, wide, cuffed balloon sleeves with embroidery.
Shopper in paper straw with two handles and a zip at the top and one inner compartment. Lined. Size 13x36x34 cm.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey. Round, picot-trimmed neckline and short sleeves with a picot trim.
Short dress in chiffon with a V-neck opening at the front, short, butterfly sleeves and a gathered yoke at the back. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Satin lining.
Short-sleeved playsuit in viscose jersey with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud. Elasticated seam and narrow ties under the bust, and pockets in the side seams.
Longer-style, straight-cut jacket in stretch jersey with notch lapels, patch front pockets and no fasteners. Unlined.
Set of two best friend necklaces made from thin metal chain, each with a pendant. Together, the pendants form a heart.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, covered buttons at the top and short, elasticated puff sleeves with a frill trim. Seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back and a gently flared skirt with a flounce at the hem. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Suit trousers in a stretch wool weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with a pointelle section at the top and buttons down the front. Scalloped trims around the neckline and hem and down the button band.
High-waisted, ankle-length running tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide panel at the waist containing a concealed key pocket.
High-waisted jersey shorts containing glittery threads. Wide legs and a concealed zip at the back.
Short-sleeved shirt in a viscose weave with a resort collar and buttons down the front. Slightly longer at the front with ties at the hem.
V-neck blouse in an airy viscose weave with dropped shoulders, short dolman sleeves, pleats at the top of the front and a box pleat at the back of the neck.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
